TopicTitle: No cargo storage units available. How do I bring parts to use when building in EVA?

Articles.Content: In KSP 1 we use SEQ-24 Cargo Storage Units to bring parts to space. How to do that in KSP 2? I have searched the list of available parts in KSP 2, but I can find nothing similar.

54 minutes ago, Baloo66 said:

In KSP 1 we use SEQ-24 Cargo Storage Units to bring parts to space. How to do that in KSP 2? I have searched the list of available parts in KSP 2, but I can find nothing similar.

 

Welcome to the forum, @Baloo66!, 

 Sadly, building in EVA is not a feature yet,(i was a console player( so i never got to see that), but i do hope it gets added someday. you will see that the devs will release updates, so keep an eye out for one saying EVA building is added.
